commit message: Change the about activity to a dialog and move the release notes there (just the most recent notes)
Bump the version number and reset the What's New section of About

Enhancements to logging plays:
- Default to a numeric field entry for a player's starting position and score, but add a button to switch to text.
- Display default numeric values as hint text (length, quantity and rating)
- When a field is added, it grabs focus
Add a seat property to Player (just the int version of the starting position
Prevent crash from sync settings when not signed in. Sort plays by play_id (after date).
Add a checkbox to show password on the login screen
Add options to control player order when logging a play

Fix crash on low density devices
Correctly update a game when not signed in
Support pink as a player color
Authentication expires with the session (not just the password)
Correctly log when the account isn't set up
Add the ability to get more debug info for crashes
